review: The device works well enough I suppose on Amazon Prime content. After trying a couple of the other apps however the Fire Stick comes up short. Netflix (which I use all the time) does some weird things. You'll be watching a movie and the video will suddenly freeze but the audio keeps going. After a few second the video super fast forwards to catch up to the audio. Very annoying behavior!Another app I use alot is HBO-GO. On this device HBO-GO is more like HBO-SLO. Slow to the point of unusable.The Amazon Fire stick is a great concept, I love the remote, but it still falling short of a seamless watching experience to date. I only hope it gets better.
